name: sync
description: Multi-agent AI operations platform with agentic RAG and ReAct workflows

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.dev: echo 'Start frontend and backend in separate terminals:' && echo '  Terminal 1: npm run dev:backend' && echo '  Terminal 2: npm run dev:frontend'
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
